settings.subuser.help: If you have recieved an email because you were added as a subuser on a server please enter that token in the box below.
node.overview.collect_usage: Attempting to collect usage information, this could take a few seconds. Please ensure server is online.
node.overview.collect_disk: Collecting disk usage information, this could take a few seconds.
node.overview.space_used: You are using %s MB of your maximum %s MB of disk space.
node.overview.ajax.no_conn: Unable to connect to the node.
node.overview.ajax.no_exec: Unable to execute command on the server.
node.console.scrollstop_alert: You have selected text in the console. The console will not auto-update when this occurs. This is done to allow you to easily copy or select text in the console. To allow for automatic refreshing again simply un-select the text.
node.files.name: File Name
node.files.edit.daemon_error: Unable to connect to the daemon.
node.files.edit.type_error: This type of file cannot be edited via our control panel.
node.files.edit.no_file: No file was specified that can be edited.
node.files.edit.error: You can return to the file manager by clicking here.
node.files.ajax.no_dir: Unable to locate request directory. Error logged.
node.files.ajax.no_dl: Unable to connect to the server to get the files. Please try again.
node.files.ajax.no_edit: This type of file cannot be edited via our online file manager. Please use a FTP client.
node.files.ajax.file_404: The file specified could not be found on the server.
node.ajax.generic_error: An error was encountered with this AJAX request.
error.unhandled: An unhandled error occured while processing this request. Please go back and try again.
error.xsrf: The XSRF token received was not valid. Please make sure cookies are enabled and try your request again.
error.invalid_password: We were unable to verify your account password. Please try your request again.
error.invalid_email: The email you provided is not valid.
error.password_mismatch: The passwords you provided did not match each other.
error.password_strength: Your password is not complex enough. Please make sure to include at least one number, and some type of mixed case. Your new password must also be at least 8 characters long.
error.account.same_email: Sorry, you can't change your email to the email address you are currently using for the account, that wouldn't make sense!
success.account.email: Your email address has been successfully updated to %s.
success.account.password: Your password has been successfully changed! Please login again using your new password.
success.notifications.updated: Your account notification preferences have been updated.
